name: toolstack
description: A toolkit for faster and safer development (logging, errors, HTTP client, mocks, and templates)

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.release: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
